name: JustPaid.ai
headline: Delightful AI rev ops.
description:
Automate accounts receivable, a delightful billing platform. Contact us: sales@justpaid.ai

------

Our values:

We are always asking ourselves, how can we make a company's team's life easier to help them scale through financial technology?

- We don’t settle.
- We are passionate.
- We are serial entrepreneurs.

We aim to make a dent in the universe
tags: industry:ai-enhanced-learning; industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:fintech; industry:ai; industry:ai-assistant; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Daniel Kivatinos, Founder
founders.description:
Building something big with JustPaid.ai, a revenue collection platform for startups.

I’m an entrepreneur and investor living in Silicon Valley, California. I’ve been working across multiple companies. I’ve raised millions of dollars of venture capital funding over the last several years for my startups.

In 2008, I started DrChrono, with millions of active users and thousands of customers; it was acquired in 2021, being in the top 30 company exits from YC, making it a top 1% YC exit.

founders.name: Anelya Grant, Founder
founders.description: Passionate accountant, worked with startup founders for the last 12 years mostly YC companies. Saw the same pain with every team: lack of communication leads to poor financial understanding. Lots of time wasted, revenue missed, and poor decisions made - i want to build a tool that helps you to make the right decision

founders.name: Vinay Datta Pinnaka, Founder
founders.description: Vinay is a co-founder and founding engineer at JustPaid with over 10 years of experience in building scalable web applications. He scaled the billing system for Drchrono to handle $4B+ worth transactions. Vinay holds a master's degree in Computer Science with a specialization in Human-Computer Interaction. He is responsible for overseeing JustPaid's technology strategy and product development

# Transform Your Billing: From Weeks to One Day
Effortlessly streamline your invoicing and payment collections with JustPaid's AI-powered solutions.
[Get started](https://www.justpaid.ai/</demo>)[Schedule demo](https://www.justpaid.ai/</demo>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/669e29f940364d4ca4a04943/66d1d8aa5ef36791c1131efb_111165201fef7e5787cc47a17cdc_Header%2520Image-p-800%201.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/669e29f940364d4ca4a04943/669e29f940364d4ca4a04a5d_unlock-the-power-of-website-analytics-bg-image-techflow-x-webflow-template.jpg)
## Manual and Inefficient Billing Processes are holding you back
Relying on email and spreadsheets leads to delays and errors that hurt your cash flow, causing issues impacting every part of your financial operations.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/669e29f940364d4ca4a04943/669e29f940364d4ca4a04a01_hero-section-bg-image-home-v1-techflow-x-webflow-template.jpg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/669e29f940364d4ca4a04943/66d1f72e0f2a04e54583bae5_Problem%201%20Error%20%26%20Discrep.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/669e29f940364d4ca4a04943/669e29f940364d4ca4a04a13_make-it-esasy-to-track-all-user-analytics-blob-techflow-x-webflow-template.jpg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/669e29f940364d4ca4a04943/66d19ded6142a990d883b301_Cashflow%20illy.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/669e29f940364d4ca4a04943/66d19e808d1a247453dd87f7_Late%20Invoices%20illy.svg)
## Delayed payments are draining your cash flow
Your cash flow takes a hit when payments are delayed by 30+ days. Simplifying invoicing ensures quick payment and financial stability.
## With JustPaid, complex billing becomes a thing of the past
JustPaid centralizes your billing and automates key processes, eliminating errors and delays. With real-time tracking and streamlined workflows, you can manage everything in one place.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/669e29f940364d4ca4a04943/66d1e6073db9b7726fd7e7a1_Cashflow%20card%201.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/669e29f940364d4ca4a04943/66d1e65396f412a09f20704d_Email%20Comms%201.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/669e29f940364d4ca4a04943/66e2c1d674645bdb0a726e0b_Pricing%20card%203.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/669e29f940364d4ca4a04943/66d1e9c1893927e7300cdf18_Email%20Comms%200.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/669e29f940364d4ca4a04943/66d1f837f73d94a526335983_Invoice%20Paid%204.png)

Features
## What sets JustPaid apart
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/669e29f940364d4ca4a04943/66d1fd33666112b4c624b540_Invoice%20generation.svg)
### Automated Invoice Generation
Save time and reduce errors with our smart invoice creation tools
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/669e29f940364d4ca4a04943/66d1fd33781950cd5dcea117_Real%20time%20Data.svg)
### Real-Time Data Analytics
Gain instant insights into your financial performance with live updates and dynamic reports
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/669e29f940364d4ca4a04943/66d1fd331d91999ce0947aad_Billing%20RUles.svg)
### Customizable Billing Rules
Easily manage complex billing scenarios with AI managed rules
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/669e29f940364d4ca4a04943/66d1fd674f20cb225118ccbe_Manage%20Approvals.svg)
### Manage approvals
Collaborate and align on customer situations before you send invoices
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/669e29f940364d4ca4a04943/66d1fd33c9641341b4d3bc95_Seamless%20Integration.svg)
### Seamless Integration
Connect effortlessly with your existing systems and platforms
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/669e29f940364d4ca4a04943/66d1fd330bfd9600fc225587_Dunning.svg)
### Dunning and AI Collections
Keep your customers on track with automated, natural language reminders before and after due dates
[Get started](https://www.justpaid.ai/</demo>)[Schedule demo](https://www.justpaid.ai/</demo>)
For teams
## Who can benefit from JustPaid?

### Fast and easy management
Become the master of your clients receivables and stay on top of generating invoices and tidy collections. Track prepaid expenses and automatic amortization schedules. Delegate and automate revenue collections and follow-ups with JustPaid AI.Don't let your clients fall behind!
### Concentrate to run your business
JustPaid handles the full cycle of revenue management from invoice generation to getting paid. Monitor financial KPIs, burn rate, runway and revenue rate with our intelligent dashboard. Combine multiple billing systems into one revenue dashboard.Reduce the cost of transaction fees.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/669e29f940364d4ca4a04943/66d1f131405621bc46e72442_entrprenuerunsplash_1N49Cn7P0Fg.png)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/669e29f940364d4ca4a04943/66d19ded6142a990d883b301_Cashflow%20illy.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/669e29f940364d4ca4a04943/66d19e808d1a247453dd87f7_Late%20Invoices%20illy.svg)
## Delayed payments are draining your cash flow
Your cash flow takes a hit when payments are delayed by 30+ days. Simplifying invoicing ensures quick payment and financial stability.
## With JustPaid, complex billing becomes a thing of the past
JustPaid centralizes your billing and automates key processes, eliminating errors and delays. With real-time tracking and streamlined workflows, you can manage everything in one place.

generated_description:
### JustPaid.ai: Revolutionizing Revenue Operations with AI

**Overview:**
Founded in 2023 and backed by Y Combinator’s W23 batch, **JustPaid.ai** is reshaping the landscape of financial technology by bringing delightful AI-enhanced revenue operations to businesses. Based in Mountain View, California, JustPaid employs a team of 10 passionate entrepreneurs who are dedicated to making financial processes simpler and more efficient.

**Mission:**
JustPaid.ai's mission is to create delightful experiences in revenue operations, focusing initially on automating accounts receivable with their innovative billing platform. The guiding question for the team is always: "How can we make a company's team's life easier to help them scale through financial technology?"

**Core Values:**
1. **No Settling:** Constantly striving for improvement and excellence.
2. **Passion:** Fueling everything they do with enthusiasm and commitment.
3. **Entrepreneurial Spirit:** They are serial entrepreneurs, understanding the pulse of growing businesses intimately.

**What They Do:**
JustPaid.ai offers a comprehensive suite of solutions designed to streamline financial processes:
- **Accounts Receivable:** Automating the flow from contract to invoice.
- **Accounts Payable:** Creating a centralized end-to-end payment process.
- **AI Financial Copilot:** A GPT-driven assistant to provide real-time insights and support.

They aim to transform tedious billing processes—turning them from weeks of work into just a single day. This efficiency not only enhances cash flow but also minimizes errors and delays in payment collections.

**Key Features:**
- **Automated Invoice Generation:** Saves time while reducing errors.
- **Real-Time Data Analytics:** Users can access instant insights into their financial performance.
- **Customizable Billing Rules:** Manage complex billing scenarios easily.
- **Seamless Integration:** Effortlessly connects with existing systems.
- **Dunning Automation:** Keeps customers informed and engaged with their payment schedules.

**Target Audience:**
JustPaid is crafted for anyone from financial experts to entrepreneurs and accountants. By automating the cycle of revenue management from invoice generation to collection, JustPaid helps its users concentrate on their core business without the distraction of billing headaches.

**Getting Involved:**
Ready to simplify your financial operations? You can start with JustPaid by scheduling a demo or reaching out via email at sales@justpaid.ai. Their website provides additional resources and insights—check it out at [justpaid.ai](https://www.justpaid.ai).

In short, JustPaid.ai is not just another financial tool; it’s a partner in your journey toward streamlined and stress-free revenue management. If you want to make a real dent in your financial operations, this is where you start.
